description:
Mil-Dot range estimating reticle for most optimal aiming and shooting performance
One piece tube with front AO
Limited lifetime warranty
Magnification:	         4.00X - 16X
Tube Diameter:	         1 Inch
Objective Diameter:     	40mm
Field of View @ 100 yards:	23' - 5.8'
Eye Relief:	         3.9" - 3.5"
Exit Pupil:	         10.0mm - 2.5mm
Click Value @100 yards:	1/4"
Length:	         365mm
Weight:	         20.1 oz
Parallax Setting:	         5 Yds - Infinity
Batteries:	         CR2032 3V
title: Sniper Scope LT4-16x40AOL with Side R/G/B Ill,qta W/e,ring,flip Open Lens Cover
